Statuses.name: Working as Expected
Statuses.description: The database is fully operational and functioning as expected.

Statuses.name: Under Maintenance
Statuses.description: The database is currently undergoing maintenance. Some features may be unavailable.

Statuses.name: Degraded Performance
Statuses.description: The database is experiencing performance issues. Response times may be slower than usual.

Statuses.name: Partial Outage
Statuses.description: The database is partially unavailable. Some features may not work as expected.

Statuses.name: Offline
Statuses.description: The database is completely offline. No features are available at this time.
